<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fix script to update the reference qualifier on rm_story table.</description>
        <name>Fix reference qualifier-sprint & release</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateRefQualForElement('sprint', 
						"'sys_idIN'+ScrumSecurityManager.getStoryDotSprint(current).join(',')",
						'javascript:ScrumSecurityManager.getStoryDotSprint(current)');
updateRefQualForElement('release',
						"'sys_idIN'+ScrumSecurityManager.getStoryDotRelease(current).join(',')",
						'javascript:ScrumSecurityManager.getStoryDotRelease(current)');

function updateRefQualForElement(element, oldReference, newReference) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'rm_story');
	gr.addQuery('element', element);
	gr.addQuery('reference_qual', 'CONTAINS', oldReference);
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.next()) {
		gs.log('Found old reference qualifier for '+element+' on rm_story. Updating it...');
		gr.setValue('reference_qual', newReference);
		if (gr.update())
			gs.log('Updated reference qualifier for '+element+' on rm_story');
		else
			gs.log('Updating reference qualifier for '+element+' on rm_story failed');
	} else
		gs.log("Not attempting to replace reference qualifier for '"+oldReference+"' since no record found matching the filter condition");
}]]></script>
